basics.name: Caseum Borgaro
basics.summary: I am passionate about learning new skills and integrating them into my projects, My goal is to leverage my creativity and technical skills to contribute to cutting-edge software solutions.

highlights: Designed and implemented medical certificate applications to automate workflows and improve data accuracy at a medical clinic.
Utilized Python to build user-friendly interfaces and integrate with existing medical systems.
Proactively sought feedback from senior developers through code reviews, refining my coding practices and gaining valuable insights into software development best practices.
Tech stack: Python, Django, Flask, Git, GitLab
Developed an advanced AI VTuber (Virtual Streamer) capable of holding a conversation and replying to it's chat using a realistic text to speech voice.
During its first-ever demo stream, the AI VTuber attracted over 25,000 views in a single day.
Tech stack: Python, VTube Studio, OBS Studio, Git, GitHub
Developed a conversational Discord AI Chatbot with a unique personality.
Integrated advanced AI model to generate contextually relevant and engaging responses.
Tech stack: Python, Flask, Git, GitHub

volunteer.organization: Employee Retention Prediction: A Machine Learning Approach using Random Forest Classifier
volunteer.summary: Lead Developer for the webapp and the machine learning model
highlights: Led development of an employee retention prediction model using Random Forest Classifier.
Implemented a robust data pipeline and deployed an interactive web application.
Utilized advanced machine learning techniques for data analysis, model training, and evaluation.
Tech stack: Python, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn, Pandas, Flask, Git, GitHub, Jupyter Notebook

volunteer.summary: Project Lead and Lead Programmer for the game.
highlights: Led and coordinated international teams of 26 professionals, including programmers and digital artists.
Supervised the creation of clean, high-quality, and efficient code, including managing source control and conducting code reviews.
Contributed to design, writing scripts and storyboards.
Created comprehensive documentation.
Oversaw recruitment, marketing, and production.
Tech stack: Python, Git, GitHub, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
